title: When I open the camera of my mobile phone, I saw a watermark type logo (like of a hacker) on the middle of the screen. Is my phone hacked or is it due to some malfunction of the camera? - Quora

response.answer_text: To answer, I'd need what it looked like, what phone you have, if its the official camera app, if you've installed some dodgy apps and then I can maybe say..
